SEARCH

Package server

package server
This package contains classes and functionalities related to server operations.

The main class in this package is server/Server, which provides various methods for server-related tasks such as determining the content type of files. The package also includes test classes to verify the functionality using JUnit.

Dependencies:

  • JUnit 5: For writing and running tests

Usage:

 
 // Example usage of the Server class to get content type of a file
 File file = new File("example.html");
 String contentType = Server.getContentType(file);
 System.out.println(contentType); // Outputs: text/html
Since:
1.0
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Server
    The Server class implements a simple HTTP server that serves static files and handles file uploads.
    Server.RootHandler
    The RootHandler class handles GET requests for serving static files.
    Server.UploadHandler
    The UploadHandler class handles POST requests for uploading files.
    ServerTest
    This class contains tests for the Server class, specifically for the getContentType method.
